name: build
description: Builds your app and places it into the output path (dist/ by default).

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project to build.

options.name: configuration
options.description: Specify the configuration to use.

options.name: prod
options.description: Flag to set configuration to 'production'.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message.

options.name: helpJson
options.description: Shows the metadata associated with each flags, in JSON format.

options.name: i18nMissingTranslation
options.description: How to handle missing translations for i18n.

options.name: main
options.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

options.name: tsConfig
options.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

options.name: optimization
options.description: Enables optimization of the build output.

options.name: outputPath
options.description: Path where output will be placed.

options.name: aot
options.description: Build using Ahead of Time compilation.

options.name: sourceMap
options.description: Output sourcemaps.

options.name: vendorSourceMap
options.description: Resolve vendor packages sourcemaps.

options.name: evalSourceMap
options.description: Output in-file eval sourcemaps.

options.name: vendorChunk
options.description: Use a separate bundle containing only vendor libraries.

options.name: commonChunk
options.description: Use a separate bundle containing code used across multiple bundles.

options.name: baseHref
options.description: Base url for the application being built.

options.name: deployUrl
options.description: URL where files will be deployed.

options.name: verbose
options.description: Adds more details to output logging.

options.name: progress
options.description: Log progress to the console while building.

options.name: i18nFile
options.description: Localization file to use for i18n.

options.name: i18nFormat
options.description: Format of the localization file specified with --i18n-file.

options.name: i18nLocale
options.description: Locale to use for i18n.

options.name: polyfills
options.description: The name of the polyfills file.

options.name: extractCss
options.description: Extract css from global styles onto css files instead of js ones.

options.name: watch
options.description: Run build when files change.

options.name: outputHashing
options.description: Define the output filename cache-busting hashing mode.

options.name: poll
options.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

options.name: deleteOutputPath
options.description: Delete the output path before building.

options.name: preserveSymlinks
options.description: Do not use the real path when resolving modules.

options.name: extractLicenses
options.description: Extract all licenses in a separate file, in the case of production builds only.

options.name: showCircularDependencies
options.description: Show circular dependency warnings on builds.

options.name: buildOptimizer
options.description: Enables @angular-devkit/build-optimizer optimizations when using the 'aot' option.

options.name: namedChunks
options.description: Use file name for lazy loaded chunks.

options.name: subresourceIntegrity
options.description: Enables the use of subresource integrity validation.

options.name: serviceWorker
options.description: Generates a service worker config for production builds.

options.name: ngswConfigPath
options.description: Path to ngsw-config.json.

options.name: skipAppShell
options.description: Flag to prevent building an app shell.

options.name: index
options.description: The name of the index HTML file.

options.name: statsJson
options.description: Generates a 'stats.json' file which can be analyzed using tools such as: #webpack-bundle-analyzer' or https: //webpack.github.io/analyse.

options.name: forkTypeChecker
options.description: Run the TypeScript type checker in a forked process.

options.name: lazyModules
options.description: List of additional NgModule files that will be lazy loaded. Lazy router modules with be discovered automatically.
